name: Hervé
description:
Hervé : a firefly's journey is a contemplative experience developed and designed for the Oculus Rift. It uses the power of the Unreal Engine.

Official website

Fly like a firefly and take a walk in a wonderful and original world full of surprises. Be immersed in a dreamy universe, and take yourself to this one-of-a-kind stroll.

Hervé is a student project developped by 6 awesome devs from the IMAC creative engineering school in Paris.

  • Lucas Hörand
  • Pierre Claisse
  • Yohan LeBreton
  • Maëlle Carlier
  • Céline Noël
  • Bettina Migot

This project is open source and can be forked on our Github Repository !

While this project is "done", we probably won't update it in the near future.
